title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard and before entering any text, a message appears at the top stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'.
EB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard and before entering any text, the message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' should not be displayed.
SR: 1. Create a new Java Project. 2. Select the project. 3. Invoke the New Java Package wizard.
